Looking at the Application Menus

When you select a component tab from the upper pane, the application inserts a specific menu item displaying the options for that component. For more information, see File menu, Change Request menu, Requirement menu, Task menu, Topic menu, and Audit menu.

Other menu items do not vary, regardless of the component selected. For more information, see Project menu, View menu, Folder menu, Tools menu, Window menu, and Help menu.
